column1: #text=Before going shopping I make a shopping list and look through my fridge and cupboards to make sure I buy everything I need .
#text=I then get into my car and drive to the store .
#text=Upon entering the store I grab a shopping cart and walk to the fresh fruits and vegetables .
#text=After getting all of my fresh items I go to the butcher stand and get some chicken and beef .
#text=I sometimes make a stop to et lunch meat and bread so I can make sandwiches for lunch .
#text=Next I go to the dairy section where I buy cheese , milk and eggs .
#text=After that I go buy some snacks and canned items .
#text=To end my trip I go to the frozen foods section because I want to make sure my frozen items stay cold until I am home .
#text=I get in line and wait to be cashed out .
#text=I almost always pay with my credit card so I do n't have to worry about money .
#text=I then leave the store , head home and unload all my groceries .
